+33 (0)6 49 98 23 18

For any information, you can contact us every day, Monday through Sunday, 9 am to 8 pm.

contact@villathalassa-lavandou.fr

Reservations can be made on our website at anytime.

Villa Thalassa, Chemin de la Fouasse, Le Lavandou

83980, France

Directions and Map

How to go to the Villa Thalassa

  • 01.

    By Train

    Toulon or Hyères-les-Palmiers SNCF station

    TGV Paris/Toulon : 4H

    Upon request, we will be pleased to book a taxi for you.

  • 02.

    By Plane

    Toulon-Hyères airport: 20 km (12.5 miles), there is a bus liaison from this airport to Le Lavandou

    St-Tropez–La Môle airport 20 km (12.5 miles)

    Nice Côte d’azur airport 120 km (75 miles)

    Marseille Provence airport 120 km (75 miles)

    Upon request, we will be pleased to book a taxi for you.

  • 03.

    By Car

    40 mn from Toulon, 30 mn from Hyères les Palmiers, 45 mn from St-Tropez village, 1h45 from Nice and Marseille.

    From Marseille/Toulon, travel to Hyères-les-Palmiers, then Le Lavandou. Follow the road D559 up to the century-old olive tree roundabout, take the exit ST-CLAIR. After 500 m, turn on to the Avenue Van Rysselberghe left from the St-Clair chapel. Go straight on Chemin de la Fouasse : after Chemin des Abeilles on your left, keep going on Chemin de la Fouasse, and after a steep left turn go up to a private lane ( Voie Privée sign on a tree) leading to Villa Thalassa’s gate.

    From Nice, take the A8 direction Marseille/Toulon, then A57 direction Toulon/Hyères-les-Palmiers. In Hyères, follow Le Lavandou. Take the road D559 up to the century-old olive tree roundabout, then the exit ST-CLAIR. After 500 m, turn on to the Avenue Van Rysselberghe left from the St-Clair chapel. Go straight on Chemin de la Fouasse : after Chemin des Abeilles on your left, keep going on Chemin de la Fouasse, and after a steep left turn go up to a private lane ( Voie Privée sign on a tree) leading to Villa Thalassa’s gate.

    From St-Tropez, follow the D98 direction Toulon, then the D559 direction Le Lavandou. Follow the road D559 up to the century-old olive tree roundabout, take the exit ST-CLAIR. After 500 m, turn on to the Avenue Van Rysselberghe left from the St-Clair chapel. Go straight on Chemin de la Fouasse : after Chemin des Abeilles on your left, keep going on Chemin de la Fouasse, and after a steep left turn go up to a private lane ( Voie Privée sign on a tree) leading to Villa Thalassa’s gate.

  • 04.

    By Boat

    Vedettes Iles d’Or shuttle from St-Tropez, La Croix-Valmer and Cavalaire

    Le Lavandou port, tel. +33(6)494004110 - secretariat@capitainerie-lelavandou.fr

  • 05.

    Parking

    Private parking on the property, that is closed with automatic gates.

* Google Map Link
